mapper.select: SELECT a.url FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.id = b.menu_id WHERE b.role_id = #{roleId}
SELECT a.url,group_concat(distinct c.role_id) roleIds FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.id = b.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role c ON c.role_id = b.role_id GROUP BY a.url
